publisher.value: Health Level Seven International (Order and Observations/ US Realm Task Force

definition.value: Micro Report refers to microbiological culture and sensitivity reporting. The DiagnosticReport is the 'entry point' for reporting and receiving these results. The various observations are nested in groups within the the Micro Report so that the proper context for nested observatio can be made. This is an exception to the general principle in FHIR in which one does not assume contest conduction between the resources.
